In environment A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} height_pred_shrink_aux : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (a b : nat) (t1 t2 : btree A), ln = ln1 ++ a :: b :: ln2 -> (forall n1 : nat, In n1 ln1 -> n1 < a) -> (forall n1 : nat, In n1 (b :: ln2) -> n1 <= a) -> length ln1 = length l1 -> l = l1 ++ t1 :: t2 :: l2 -> height_pred n (ln1 ++ Init.Nat.pred a :: ln2) (l1 ++ node t1 t2 :: l2) t m : list A t1, t2 : btree A H : distinct_leaves (node t1 t2) H0 : forall a : A, f a = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a m IHt1 : distinct_leaves t1 -> length (encode eqA_dec (compute_code t1) m) = weight_tree f t1 IHt2 : distinct_leaves t2 -> length (encode eqA_dec (compute_code t2) m) = weight_tree f t2 Unable to unify "sum_leaves f t1 + length (encode eqA_dec (compute_code t1) m) + (sum_leaves f t2 + length (encode eqA_dec (compute_code t2) m))" with "length (encode eqA_dec (map (fun v : A * list bool => let (a1, b1) := v in (a1, false :: b1)) (compute_code t1) ++ map (fun v : A * list bool => let (a1, b1) := v in (a1, true :: b1)) (compute_code t2)) m)".

forall (m : list A) (t : btree A), distinct_leaves t -> (forall a : A, f a = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a m) -> length (encode eqA_dec (compute_code t) m) = weight_tree f t

prod2list_reorder : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (a : nat) (b b1 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list nat) (l3 l4 l5 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l3 -> length l2 = length l4 -> (forall b0 : nat, In b0 l1 -> b0 <= a) -> (forall b0 : nat, In b0 l2 -> b0 <= a) -> permutation (l3 ++ b :: l4) (b1 :: l5) ->...-> exists l6 l7 : list (btree A), length l1 = length l6 /\ length l2 = length l7 /\ permutation (b1 :: l5) (l6 ++ b1 :: l7) /\ prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: l2) (l6 ++ b1 :: l7) <= prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: l2) (l3 ++ b :: l4)

cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
prod2list_reorder2 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (a : nat) (b c b1 c1 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list nat) (l3 l4 l5 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l3 -> length l2 = length l4 -> (forall b0 : nat, In b0 l1 -> b0 <= a) -> (forall b0 : nat, In b0 l2 -> b0 <= a) ->...-> exists l6 l7 : list (btree A), length l1 = length l6 /\ length l2 = length l7 /\ permutation (b1 :: c1 :: l5) (l6 ++ b1 :: c1 :: l7) /\ prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: a :: l2) (l6 ++ b1 :: c1 :: l7) <= prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: a :: l2) (l3 ++ b :: c :: l4)
ordered_cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
ordered_cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
prod2list_eq : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (a : nat) (b c : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 : list nat) (l4 l5 l6 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l4 -> length l2 = length l5 -> length l3 = length l6 -> prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ a :: l3) (l4 ++ b :: l5 ++ c :: l6) = prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ a :: l3) (l4 ++ c :: l5 ++ b :: l6)
prod2list_le_r : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (a b : nat) (c d : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 : list nat) (l4 l5 l6 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l4 -> length l2 = length l5 -> length l3 = length l6 -> sum_leaves f d <= sum_leaves f c -> b <= a -> prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l4 ++ d :: l5 ++ c :: l6) <= prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l4 ++ c :: l5 ++ d :: l6)
prod2list_le_l : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (a b : nat) (c d : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 : list nat) (l4 l5 l6 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l4 -> length l2 = length l5 -> length l3 = length l6 -> sum_leaves f c <= sum_leaves f d -> a <= b -> prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l4 ++ d :: l5 ++ c :: l6) <= prod2list f (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l4 ++ c :: l5 ++ d :: l6)
height_pred_length : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> length ln = length l
height_pred_weight : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> n * sum_leaves f t + weight_tree f t = prod2list f ln l
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
height_pred_not_nil1 : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> ln <> nil
height_pred_ordered_cover : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> ordered_cover l t
prod2list_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 : list nat) (l2 : list (btree A)) (l3 : list nat) (l4 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l2 -> prod2list f (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) = prod2list f l1 l2 + prod2list f l3 l4
height_pred_not_nil2 : forall (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> l <> nil
ordered_cover_height_pred : forall (n : nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), ordered_cover l t -> exists ln : list nat, height_pred n ln l t
Inductive cover (A : Type) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover (t :: nil) t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments cover_one _%type_scope Arguments cover_node _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope

```intros.
induction t.
- simpl. tauto.
- simpl. intros. 
  specialize (IHt1 H). specialize (IHt2 H0).
  rewrite <- IHt1. rewrite <- IHt2.
  reflexivity.```

original: intros. induction t. - simpl. tauto. - simpl. intros. specialize (IHt1 H). specialize (IHt2 H0). rewrite <- IHt1. rewrite <- IHt2. reflexivity.
